name: ListStarredRepositories
description:
Retrieve repositories starred by the authenticated user.

This tool fetches a list of repositories that the authenticated user has starred on GitHub. It can also provide information on when the stars were created if desired.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: The property to sort the results by. Use 'created' for sorting by the star creation date or 'updated' for the last push date.

value_schema.description: The property to sort the results by. `created` means when the repository was starred. `updated` means when the repository was last pushed to.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: The direction to sort the results by. Use 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending.

value_schema.description: The direction to sort the results by.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of repositories to return per page, maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page_number_to_fetch
parameters.description: Specify the page number of results to retrieve. Use for pagination of starred repositories.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
